definitions: set down in writing or some other permanent form for later reference

examples.text: the first recorded use of the term was in 1865
new figures show recorded crime has fallen by around ten percent

shortDefinitions: set down in writing or some other permanent form for later reference

definitions: (of sound or a performance) converted into a permanent form for subsequent reproduction or broadcast

examples.text: the recorded sound is extremely clear
